data.name: Nature Experience in Germany
data.description:
A walk-through, interactive, highly immersive and barrier-free virtual reality world about German natural landscapes produced by the German National Tourist Board.

In the application, the "visitor" himself can choose between different locations, media, and degrees of interaction. Several senses are addressed.

Highlights of the experience:

- a 360-degree flight in a "drone" over German natural landscapes

- Huge interactive picture gallery with top motifs of the German nature

- Large cinema with impressive "Embrace.German.Nature‚Äù film

- Climbing on rock and rope through mountains and caves.

- "Sustainability Train", which gives tips for environmental and climate-friendly travel

- 3D sound journey along the four seasons with sounds of nature in 3D

- 360-degree spherical film panoramas that your digital hands can pull over your head

- Evening atmosphere at the campsite. Grill your marshmallow in the campfire, touch things and get tips on sustainable travel. You can even lie down in the tent and watch the stars.
